messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message:
> For run_flow_async operation, we have an api call to get flow execution status (GET URL_BASE/jobs/status?job_id*={*job_id*}*).
> This translate to a polling mechanism. How can we implement a push model in a metaflow?
>  
> I haven’t seen in documentation, but would to verify if there is an api for sync operation?
@shaunak has been doing work on a sync operation and should be able to provide help on how to get that to work
